Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: A3 and A4 photocopier, journals, magazines, language tapes, newspapers, DVDs for adults and children and talking books. Children's activities include under 5s Story Time and Baby Time, school and nursery visits (all children's activities are held in term-time only). Has a reading group for adults (see separate entry). Exhibition space and noticeboard available for booking, please contact staff for details. Toilets for the public. Holds Christmas activities in December. Takes part in the Stannington Carnival (see separate entry) in July and "Off the Shelf" events in October. Provides 2 People's Network computers with Microsoft Office and Internet access available for the public.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 1.30-7pm, Tues & Thurs closed, Wed & Fri 10am-12.30pm, 1.30-7pm, Sat 9.30am-12.30pm (opening times); Wed at 2.30 (under 5s Story Time, term-time only), one Fri in the month 10.30-11.15am (Baby Time), one Fri in the month 10.30-11.30am (reading group)
